subject: PROD Deployment Checklist - Need Agreement
body:
Team,

El Gotan wants confirmation before PROD deployment. Please reply with status.

## PROD DEPLOYMENT CHECKLIST

### TangoTiempo (Sarah) - appId=1
- [x] MapCenter appId fix committed (4dae939)
- [x] v1.14.1 on TEST branch
- [x] TEST verified: sign in/out + role change works
- [ ] Waiting to merge TEST â†’ PROD

### HarmonyJunction (Chord) - appId=2
- [ ] MapCenter appId fix committed to DEVL?
- [ ] Merged to TEST?
- [ ] TEST verified?

### Azure Functions (Fulton)
- [x] BE-AF PROD deployed (e710778)
- [ ] radiusMiles fix deployed?
- [ ] PUT appId in body fix deployed?

## REQUIRED: Reply with your status

Chord: Confirm HJ MapCenter fix is on DEVL and TEST
Fulton: Confirm all BE-AF fixes deployed to PROD

Once all confirm, we can merge TT and HJ frontends to PROD.

- Sarah
